readable.title: 427683329_95d510a087
readable.content: An older woman in sunglasses sits behind a man in a yellow shirt . An older woman with big sunglasses sits behind a man in a yellow shirt , perhaps at a ball game or other event . An old white-haired lady wearing sunglasses is sitting behind a man in yellow . Closeup of the side of an old woman 's face with oversized sun blocking glasses , gray hair and a gold earring . Older woman wearing sunglasses and a golden earring .
